title: At-Home Learning Courses
cleaned_text: Pediatrics A-Z, Parts 1-15 - Signs & Symptoms in Pediatric Casetaking With Dr. Gheorge Jurj, MD, PhD ----- For students who are interested in the Spanish translation of the Pediatrics course, the fee is 50€ for each module (12 h). Please send your payment via Paypal directly to Antonio Ortega: [pranada11@gmail.com](mailto:pranada11@gmail.com) . You can also send him an email if you have any questions about the Spanish translation. ----- Watch the free bonus sessions: 2](https://wholehealthnow.com/video/gheorghe-jurj-2.html) for session 1, Part 3](https://wholehealthnow.com/video/gheorghe-jurj-4.html) ---- Enrol in and access the following link if you have enrolled for the entire 3-12 series) [Module 3: ](https://whnclasses.com/course/view.php?id=225) Bryonia, Bufo, Berberis, (more come) [Module 5:](https://whnclasses.com/course/view.php?id=229) (kale bic, kali ars, kali-phos) [Module 10:](https://whnclasses.com/course/view.php?id=256) Kalium family enrolled for the entire 13-15 modules) [Module 13:](https://whnclasses.com/course/view.php?id=262)
